text: Muricauda beolgyonensis is a Gram-negative, rod-shaped and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Muricauda which has been isolated from tidal flat in Korea. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Muricauda beolgyonensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase == Further reading == * Category:Flavobacteria Category:Bacteria described in 2012
title: Muricauda beolgyonensis
